about_the_game:
The following content is included:

●Makeup/Face Paint: Special Bloom

Facepaint in a beautiful floral design. Be the flower that dances gracefully across the hunting grounds!
Enjoy the hunting life with special makeup/face paint!

*This item changes the appearance of your hunter. It does not affect stats or abilities.
*After obtaining this content, it can be used from the character creation screen or 'Appearance Menu' in the tent.

*This product is also available as part of a set. Please be careful of duplicate transactions.
*You may need to update to the latest version of the game to use this content.
